alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 26 at 9:12AM EDT until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Huron River Near Hamburg. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 7.4 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
